amendment.description: To make additional appropriations for emergency relief activities.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 97 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 46. Record Vote Number: 17.
Amendment SA 97 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S1229-1234; text: CR S1230) To make additional appropriations for emergency relief activities.
